name.value: BgGGZ - PHR Client - Scenario 1.1 - Retrieve all GGZ resources of person 1

description.value: Scenario 1.1 - Retrieve all GGZ information of person 1
Query Patient resource including the patient's general practitioner for HCIM Patient
Test PHR client to retrieve Patient resources.
Confirm that HTTP header Authorization contains the patient token Bearer 6fc70c51-bdda-422e-9eaa-899fe24c4ef9
Confirm that query parameter 'patient=' was not present to avoid BSNs in the URL.
Confirm that query parameter 'subject=' was not present to avoid BSNs in the URL.
Make sure that the test server (WildFHIR) gives a success response.
Confirm that the test server (WildFHIR) returns a Bundle.
Confirm that the response Bundle contains 1 Patient resource(s).
Confirm that the response Bundle contains 1 Practitioner resource(s).
